home.text_1: Zum goldenen Kalb is Munich's first and only New York steakhouse.
home.text_2: Here you can get the most authentic steaks in town directly across from the Schranne at Viktualienmarkt.
home.text_3: Give us a call or book your table online now.

book.text_1: Online reservation for up to 6 people.
book.text_2: Table reservations for 7 or more people by telephone on
book.text_3: Please enquire by telephone about times other than those suggested.
book.text_4: Please allow 2 1/2 hours for your visit.
book.text_5: There are no time restrictions after 20:00.
book.text_7: We send you a confirmation e-mail.

menu.service_1: WE WILL ACCOMPANY YOU TO THE
menu.all: ALL STEAKS ALSO AVAILABLE AS SURF&TURF WITH BLACK TIGER PRAWNS 14 EACH
menu.grill: All steaks are prepared on our HaJaTec charcoal grill

reviews.london: I won't forget my evening here in a hurry. I was taken here for my birthday - a wonderful experience from start to finish. Very helpful and friendly staff. The steaks were cooked to perfection and the cocktails were heavenly.
reviews.sabri: Great place if you are looking for a good steak in Munich.
reviews.silvana: We stumbled upon this place by chance and everything impressed us! Super delicious steak and there was something for everyone in the meat selection. The service was attentive and very polite! We'll be back!
reviews.lucas: Beautiful ambiance at Viktualienmarkt! One of the best steak tartars in the city, that's all I had. Nice outdoor area.
reviews.juli: I've been to many steakhouses in Munich, but the steak here was worlds better! It's been a long time since I've had such a tender and juicy piece of beef.

regularHours.summer: Saturday, June - August: 11.30 am - 5.00 pm Terras Menu

specialHours.title: Special Opening Hours 2025
specialHours.carnivalParty: Carnival Tuesday (March 4): Join us for our Carnival Party! (Restaurant closed that day)

specialHours.expo: Special opening on Sunday & Monday, October 5-6 for the EXPO!
specialHours.decemberMondays: We are open on Mondays in December! Closed Dec 24-26 for Christmas.
